0:
--------------------
Text: La Garganta (Spanish for "the throat", or "gully") is a private estate, or finca, of around 15,000 ha (32,000 acres) in extent, located in the rugged Sierra Morenain, in rural Ciudad Real province, Castile-La Mancha region, Spain.
Triplets:<La Garganta
2:
--------------------
Text: La Garganta (finca):  Around 2003 it was bought on lease and renovated by Gerald Grosvenor, 6th Duke of Westminster.
